verses.verse: <S%G4779><s%> And Having Called Together <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> , Of Him, <S%G846><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons, <S%G1140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Diseases <S%G3554><s%> To Heal, <S%G2323><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Heal <S%G2390><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Being Sick. <S%G770><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Take <S%G142><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way; <S%G3598><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> , Staves, <S%G4464><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Provision Bag, <S%G4082><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Bread, <S%G740><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Money, <S%G694><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Each <S%G303><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Tunics <S%G5509><s%> To Have. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G302><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Ye May Enter, <S%G1525><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Remain, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> Go Forth. <S%G1831><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> As Many As <S%G3361><s%> May Not Receive <S%G1209><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Going Forth <S%G1831><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> That City <S%G1565><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dust <S%G2868><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Your Feet <S%G5216><s%> Shake Off, <S%G660><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Testimony <S%G3142><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1831><s%> And Going Forth <S%G1161><s%> They Passed <S%G1330><s%> Through <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Villages, <S%G2968><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Healing <S%G2323><s%> Everywhere. <S%G3837><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Heard Of <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Being Done <S%G1096><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Perplexed, <S%G1280><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> It Was Said <S%G3004><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G5100><s%> Some, <S%G3754><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Has Been Raised <S%G1453><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead; <S%G3498><s%>

By <S%G5259><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Also, <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Had Appeared; <S%G5316><s%> By Others <S%G243><s%> Also, <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ancients <S%G744><s%> Had Arisen. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> I 1473 P-1NS 607 V-AAI-1S Beheaded, 5101 I-NSM But Who 1161 CONJ Is 2076 V-PXI-3S This 3778 D-NSM Concerning 4012 PREP Whom 3739 R-GSM I 1473 P-1NS Hear 191 V-PAI-1S Such Things? 5108 D-APN And 2532 CONJ He Sought 2212 V-IAI-3S To See 1492 V-2AAN Him. 846 P-ASM

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Returned <S%G5290><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> Related <S%G1334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> They Had Done. <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G3880><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G5298><s%> ' He Retired <S%G2596><s%> Apart <S%G2398><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> Desert <S%G2048><s%> Of A City <S%G4172><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Bethsaida. <S%G966><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Having Known It <S%G1097><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Received <S%G1209><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Of Healing <S%G2322><s%> He Cured. <S%G2390><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Decline, <S%G2827><s%> <S%G4334><s%> And Having Come <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Dismiss <S%G630><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Around <S%G2945><s%> Villages <S%G2968><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country <S%G68><s%> They May Lodge, <S%G2647><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Find <S%G2147><s%> Provisions; <S%G1979><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Desert <S%G2048><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> We Are. <S%G2070><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> To Eat. <S%G5315><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Are Not <S%G1526><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> <S%G2486><s%> Fishes, <S%G1487><s%> Unless Indeed <S%G3385><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Should Buy <S%G59><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> This People <S%G5126><s%> Victuals; <S%G1033><s%>

They Were <S%G2258><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> About <S%G5616><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Five Thousand. <S%G4000><s%> <S%G2036><s%> But He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> Make Recline <S%G2625><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In Companies <S%G2828><s%> By <S%G303><s%> Fifties. <S%G4004><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> They Did <S%G4160><s%> So, <S%G3779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made Recline <S%G347><s%> All. <S%G537><s%>

<S%G2983><s%> And Having Taken <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Fishes, <S%G2486><s%> Having Looked Up <S%G308><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> He Blessed <S%G2127><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Broke, <S%G2622><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> To Set Before <S%G3908><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Ate <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Satisfied <S%G5526><s%> All; <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Taken Up <S%G142><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Over And Above <S%G4052><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Of Fragments <S%G2801><s%> Hand Baskets <S%G2894><s%> Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As Was <S%G1511><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Praying <S%G4336><s%> , Alone, <S%G2651><s%> Were With <S%G4895><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Pronounce <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> To Be? <S%G1511><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist; <S%G910><s%> <S%G243><s%> And Others, <S%G1161><s%> Elijah; <S%G2243><s%> <S%G243><s%> And Others, <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ancients <S%G744><s%> Has Arisen. <S%G450><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Ye Pronounce <S%G3004><s%> To Be? <S%G1511><s%> <S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Strictly Enjoining <S%G2008><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Charged Them <S%G3853><s%> To No One <S%G3367><s%> To Tell <S%G2036><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> It Is Necessary For <S%G1163><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> To Suffer, <S%G3958><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Rejected <S%G593><s%> By <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Killed, <S%G615><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> To Be Raised. <S%G1453><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> Desires <S%G2309><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Me <S%G3450><s%> , To Come, <S%G2064><s%> Let Him Deny <S%G533><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Take Up <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4716><s%> <S%G846><s%> ' His Cross <S%G2596><s%> Daily, <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Follow <S%G190><s%> Me; <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> To Save, <S%G4982><s%> Shall Lose <S%G622><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Lose <S%G622><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Shall Save <S%G4982><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For What <S%G1063><s%> Is Profited <S%G5623><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> Having Gained <S%G2770><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Whole, <S%G3650><s%> <S%G1438><s%> But Himself <S%G1161><s%> Having Destroyed <S%G622><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Suffered The Loss Of? <S%G2210><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Have Been Ashamed Of <S%G1870><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> Words, <S%G3056><s%> Him <S%G5126><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Will Be Ashamed Of <S%G1870><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> He Shall Come <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Of Himself <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Angels. <S%G32><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> But I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Of A Truth, <S%G230><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Taste <S%G1089><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> They Shall Have Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> These Words <S%G5128><s%> About <S%G5616><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Eight <S%G3638><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G3880><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> He Went Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> To Pray. <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As Prayed <S%G4336><s%> He <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Appearance <S%G1491><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Of His Face Became <S%G846><s%> Altered, <S%G2087><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2441><s%> His Clothing <S%G846><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> Effulgent. <S%G1823><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Talked With <S%G4814><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Elijah, <S%G2243><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Appearing <S%G3700><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Spoke Of <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1841><s%> His Departure <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was About <S%G3195><s%> To Accomplish <S%G4137><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Oppressed <S%G916><s%> With Sleep <S%G5258><s%> <S%G1235><s%> And Having Awoke Fully <S%G1161><s%> They Saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> His Glory, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Stood With <S%G4921><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As Departed <S%G1316><s%> These <S%G846><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> For Us <S%G2248><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> To Be; <S%G1511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Us Make <S%G4160><s%> Tabernacles <S%G4633><s%> Three, <S%G5140><s%> <S%G1520><s%> For Thee, <S%G4671><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For Moses <S%G3475><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1520><s%> For Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Is Saying. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G5023><s%> But These Things <S%G1161><s%> As He <S%G846><s%> Was Saying <S%G3004><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> A Cloud <S%G3507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Overshadowed <S%G1982><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5399><s%> And They Feared <S%G1161><s%> As <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cloud : <S%G3507><s%>
